# ElectricHVACLoadEvent.Session.State.begin

**Case**

A state that represents the start of the session.

## Declaration

```swift
case begin
```

## Discussion

The electricity measurement stage must be 0

## Setting session states

- **ElectricHVACLoadEvent.Session.State.active**: A state that represents all electricity consumption events with active states.
- **ElectricHVACLoadEvent.Session.State.end**: The end of the session when a load device goes to idle, that is, power/stage returns to zero indicating the load device is no longer consuming or generating electricity A state that represents the end of the session.
